title: TV Tonight: Hiro Nakamura finally back on 'Heroes Reborn'
text:
TV Tonight: Hiro Nakamura finally back on 'Heroes Reborn' By Chuck Barney Posted: 10/22/2015 03:00:00 AM PDT WATCH THIS: 
"Heroes Reborn" (8 p.m., NBC): There's a familiar face on tonight's episode as fan favorite Masi Oka returns in the role of Hiro Nakamura. Meanwhile, Noah Bennet (Jack Coleman) takes matters in his own hands to get the answers he seeks. 
"Bones" (8 p.m., Fox): Betty White drops in tonight. She guest stars as brilliant forensic anthropologist who is called in to assist the investigation after the remains of a real estate agent are found in the forest and appear to have been destroyed by coyote-wolf hybrids. 
"Scandal" (9 p.m., ABC): In an episode titled "You Got Served," Olivia (Kerry Washington) needs backup to handle the latest crisis, but the person she turns to is an unlikely source. Uh oh, please don't say it's Daddy. Masi Oka stars as Hiro Nakamura and Jack Coleman as Noah Bennet in "Heroes Reborn." (Christos Kalohoridis/NBC) (NBC)
